description: boot with white lining; black silk boot with applied (glued?) green embroidered 2 1/4"band; black braid applied on ankle; pear shaped elongated stiff stitched sole doesn't cover very pointed toe area; PR toe has applied green decoration; other toe areas show evidence of missing decoration; boot a: paper label on inside PR with mark E25; tied together
markings: a:  inside PR, on paper label: [E25]
object_name: Pair of Shoes for Bound Feet
title: Pair of Shoes for Bound Feet
